amendment.description: Amendment authorizes Teach for America at $20 million for Fiscal Year 2009 and $25 million for Fiscal Year 2010.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in House Report 110-523 to authorize Teach for America at $20 million for FY09 and $25 million for FY10.

action.text: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Van Hollen.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
